overview: Ahmad Akbar is a cineast with big projects. He wants to launch a cinema place for Black filmmakers, somewhere in the desert, far from LA and Hollywood. Cineland. That's the name of the place, man. Cineland! Akbar makes the American Dream too - a Black version of the Amercian Dream. The White version was fragile. The Black version is desperate.
title: Akbar in Cineland
